title: Re-Rolling champion shards
body:
Hello, i just have this one question.

When you re-roll 3 champion shards to obtain a new permanent champ, does it randomly pick a champion from the entire champion list or just certain champions that is worth more than one of your shards?

Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
*Lew* is on point here, the champion you get from any reroll is essentially random, with the only modifier of it trying to prioritize what you don't already own.

Check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for a rundown on the system. Let me know if you have any other questions.
Re-rolling will give you a permanent shard of a champion you don't own but the value of that shard is random.
